com.centurylink.mdw.auth

Class OAuthAuthenticator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.centurylink.mdw.auth.OAuthAuthenticator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Authenticator

    public class OAuthAuthenticator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Authenticator

    Authenticates using OAuth - normally used in the PaaS space
    For an example of how to use this

    See Also:
    Note that, despite the fact that this has similar functionality to LdapAdapter, the info coming back is different in the PaaS space

        public java.lang.String getKey()
        Specified by:
        getKey in interface Authenticator
        Returns:
        Identifies this authenticator versus others of the same type to allow clients to avoid re-prompting for credentials when the user has already logged in to the same location.
